attributes.action: take first aid questions out of the dsa theory test and make a seperate one for automatic drivers
attributes.additional_details:
take first aid questions out of the dsa theory test and make a seperate one for automatic drivers .

i have failed my dsa theory test on a first aid topic  4 times, mainly on a cpr question about breathing into the victim
i feel this is rediculous as the goverment brought out an advert staring vinnie jones saying NOT to breath in to peoples mouths.
